messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry Andre Here is the link for the conference info. http://www.northeastunschoolingconference.com/ Check it out, it ought to be great. Carol ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Sorry Andre'

Here is the link for the conference info.

http://www.northeastunschoolingconference.com/

Check it out, it ought to be great.
Carol

----- Original Message -----
From: "andre whetstone" <tuathadedans@...>
To: <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2006 10:11 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]


> where can we find information on the conference..I was aware of september
> in New Mexico... but not may in Mass
> Thanks
> andre'
> unschooling in Indiana
> Broguen !7 - LeCe 15 - Trinity 11 and Aubra 4
>
> camden <ccoutlaw@...> wrote:
> Hi All,
>
> In anticipation of the May conference I have set up a yahoo group for the
> kids & teens. My hope is some connections might be made even before the
> conference.
>
> This will be a safe place for the kids to send messages & post pictures if
> they choose.
>
> In the interest of safety (not control) all members will have to be
> approved by me & all areas are only open to members. I hope this will
> make it so all the kids (and parents) no matter what age will feel
> comfortable here.
>
> Please pass along to anyone you know is coming or thinking about coming to
> the conference !!
>
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NortheastUnschoolingConferencekidsnteens
>
>
> See you in May !!
>
> Carol
>
